docs.title: Software Development
docs.text: • Tools

docs.title: Basics
docs.text:
git status
git diff
git add
git add -all
git commit -m <msg>
git log --graph

docs.title: Checkout
docs.text:
git checkout
git checkout -b
git checkout master
git checkout -- .                           Remove unstaged commits
git checkout <branch> -- <files>            Checkout files from another branch

docs.title: Push & Pull
docs.text:
git push origin <branch>
git pull origin <branch>
git pull --rebase origin <branch>
git fetch
git merge origin/master

docs.title: Stash
docs.text:
git stash list
git stash push
git stash push -m 'message'
git stash --untracked
git stash --all
git stash pop
git stash apply
git stash apply stash@{n}
git stash drop
git stash drop stash@{n}
git stash clear
git stash show --text
git stash show --text -p stash@{1}

docs.title: Reset & Revert
docs.text:
git reset --hard
git reset --hard hash
git reset --hard ~HEAD
git reset --soft HEAD~1
git restore .
git restore -S .
git clean -df
git revert hash
git rebase -i HEAD~n
git commit --amend -m 'message'
git remote add <origin>

docs.title: Worktree
docs.text:
git update-index --skip-worktree <files>
git update-index --no-skip-worktree <files>

git update-index --assume-unchanged <files>
git update-index --no-assume-unchanged <files>

docs.title: Patch
docs.text:
git diff HEAD > example.patch
git reset --hard
patch -p1 < example.patch

docs.title: Basics
docs.text:
whoami                          Display username
whatis cmd                      What is cmd
whereis cmd                     Where is cmd
locate file                     Find file by quick search of system index
man cmd                         Manual of cmd
cmd --help                      Usage of cmd
history                         History of commands used
watch -n t 'cmd'                Execute cmd & output every t seconds

docs.title: Disk
docs.text:
df                              Disk info
du                              Disk usage

docs.title: Shell
docs.text:
reset                           Reload the shell
env                             Show env variables
echo $KEY                       Value of KEY
export KEY=value                Set value to KEY
$PATH                           Executable search path
$HOME                           Home directory
$SHELL                          Current shell

docs.title: Shortcuts
docs.text:
CTRL + C                        Stop current command
CTRL + Z                        Sleep program
CTRL + A                        Start of line
CTRL + E                        End of line
CTRL + U                        Cut from start of line
CTRL + K                        Cut to end of line

docs.title: Last Command
docs.text:
!!                              Repeat last command
!abc                            Run last command starting with abc
!abc:p                          Print last command starting with abc
!$                              Last argument of previous command
ALT + .                         Last argument of previous command
!*                              All arguments of previous command
^abc^123                        Run previous command, replacing abc with 123

docs.title: Input Output
docs.text:
Data streams: stdin(0), stdout(1), stderr(2)
cmd < file                      Input file to cmd
cmd << delimiter                Append input to cmd till delimiter
cmd > file                      Output to file
cmd >> file                     Append output to file
cmd > /dev/null                 Discard output
cmd 2 > file                    stderr to file
cmd 1 > &2                      stdout to stderr
cmd 2 > &1                      stderr to stdout
cmd & > file                    Every stdout of cmd to file

docs.title: Pipes, Nesting, etc
docs.text:
cmd1 | cmd2                     Pass output of cmd1 to cmd2
cmd1 | &cmd2                    Pass error of cmd1 to cmd2
cmd1 | xargs cmd2               Pass output of cmd1 as argument to cmd2

cmd1; cmd2                      Run cmd1, then cmd2
cmd1 && cmd2                    Run cmd2 if cmd1 is successful
cmd1 || cmd2                    Run cmd2 if cmd1 not successful
cmd &                           Run cmd in subshell

docs.title: Directory
docs.text:
basename path                   Directory name
dirname path                    Parent Directory name
pwd                             Present working directory
mkdir dir                       Make directory
cd dir                          Change directory
cd ..                           Go back
ls                              List
  -a                              all
  -R                              recursive
  -r                              reverse
  -t                              last modified
  -S                              sort by file size
  -l                              long listing format
  -1                              one file per line
  -m                              comma seperated
  -Q                              quoted

docs.title: Search
docs.text:
grep pattern file1 file2              Search for pattern in file1 & file2
grep -i pattern file                  Case insensitive
grep -I pattern file                  Ignore binary files
grep -m n pattern file                Stop after n searches
grep -n pattern file                  Show line number
grep -o pattern file                  Show only matched part of file
grep -q pattern file                  Quiet, do not show output
grep -r pattern .                     Search recursively in sub-directories
grep -v pattern file                  Inverted search (not matching)
grep -w pattern file                  Search as a word

find . -name pattern                  Find file with name as pattern
find . -iname pattern                 Case insensitive name
find . -name pattern -delete          Delete matched files
find . -name pattern -depth 2         Directory depth
find . -name pattern -user uname      Owned by user uname
find . -name pattern -type f          Search only files
find . -name pattern -type d          Search only directories

docs.title: Files
docs.text:
touch file                      Create file
cat file1 file2                 Concatenate files and stdout
less file                       View and paginate file
file file                       Get type of file
cp file1 file2                  Copy
mv file1 file2                  Move
rm file                         Remove
head file                       Show first 10 lines
tail file                       Show last 10 lines
tail -n 2 file                  Show last 2 lines
tail -F file                    stdout last lines of file as it changes

docs.title: Permissions
docs.text:
chmod 777 file                  777: <owner><group><everyone>
chmod -R 777 folder             Recursively change mode in folder
chown user:group file           Change file owner to user and group to group

4: read(r)
2: write(w)
1: execute(x)

Calculate permission number by adding these numbers
7: rwx
6: rw
5: rx
4: w
2: r
1: x

docs.title: Processes
docs.text:
ps                              Show snapshot of processes
top                             Show real time processes
kill pid                        Kill process with id
pkill name                      Kill process with name
killall name                    Kill all processes with names starting with name

docs.title: Manipulation
docs.text:
cut -d 'delimiter' -f n         Split by delimiter and print the field at nth position
cut -d ' ' -f 2                 Split by space & print the second field
cut -w -f 2                     Split by whitespaces
cut -c n                        Show till n characters
cut -c n-                       Show after n characters
cut -c m-n,r-s,t-               Show from m to n and r to s and after t characters

awk
awk '{print $1, $2}'            Print the first and second field

echo 'hello' |
  tr 'e' 'f'                    Replace e with f
  tr -d 'e'                     Remove e

docs.title: Info
docs.text:
iwconfig                        Network Interface
lscpu                           CPU
sensors                         Sensors and temperature
watch -n 2 sensors

docs.title: Services
docs.text: service --status-all

docs.title: Basics
docs.text:
.                   Repeat the last edit command
u                   Undo
U                   Undo line
CTRL + R            Redo
CTRL + O            Execute one command in insert mode
CTRL + [            Exit insert mode

docs.title: Line
docs.text:
gg                  First line of file
G                   Last line of file
ngg, nG, :n         Line number n

H                   Highest line on screen
M                   Middle line on screen
L                   Lowest line on screen

docs.title: Cursor
docs.text:
h                   Left
j                   Down
k                   Up
l                   Right

docs.title: Scroll
docs.text:
CTRL + F            Scroll forward
CTRL + B            Scroll backward

CTRL + D            Scroll forward by half screen
CTRL + U            Scroll backward by half screen

docs.title: Reposition
docs.text:
CTRL + E            Scroll forward without moving cursor
CTRL + Y            Scroll backward without moving cursor

zt                  Reposition line to top of screen
zz                  Reposition line to middle of screen
zb                  Reposition line to bottom of screen

docs.title: Jumps
docs.text:
• Lowercase letters b, e, w, ge jump to puntuations like comma (not space)
  • Uppercase letters B, E, W, gE jump over puntuations like comma (not space)

docs.title: Word
docs.text:
b                   Beginning of current word
e                   End of current word
w                   Beginning of next word
ge                  End of previous word

docs.title: Line
docs.text:
0                   Beginning of line
$                   End of line
_                   Beginning of line without whitespace
g_                  End of line without whitespace
gm                  Middle of line

docs.title: Paragraph
docs.text:
%                   Matching bracket

(                   Previous sentence
)                   Next sentence

{                   Previous paragraph
}                   Next paragraph

[[                  Previous section
]]                  Next section

docs.title: Motions
docs.text:
[frequency][operation][motion]
or [operation][frequency][motion]

# Operations
a                   around
i                   inside

# Motions
w                   word
s                   sentence
p                   paragraph
b, )                ()
B, {}               {}
t, <>               <>
"                   ""

docs.title: Join
docs.text:
J                   Join two lines
:x,yj               Join lines x to y

docs.title: Insert
docs.text:
i, a                Insert (before cursor), append (after cursor)
I, A                Insert at beginning of line, Append at end of line
o, O                Insert in new line below, above

docs.title: Yank
docs.text:
yy, Y               Yank line
y0                  Yank from the start of line
y$                  Yank till the end of line

yi(                 Yank inside ()
ya(                 Yank around ()

p                   Paste after
P                   Paste before

docs.title: Change
docs.text:
cc                  Change line
C                   Change till the end of line
cG                  Change till the end of file

cw                  Change word
2cw                 Change 2 words
caw                 Change around word
ca)                 Change around ()

r                   Replace character
R                   Keep replacing text

s                   Substitute character (with insert mode)
S                   Substitute line (with insert mode)

docs.title: Delete
docs.text:
dd                  Delete line
d^                  Delete from the start of line
dD                  Delete till the end of line

x                   Delete character under cursor
X                   Delete character before cursor

di}                 delete inside {}
dfs                 delete upto 's'
d/pattern           delete upto the pattern
dn                  delete upto the next highlighted pattern

CTRL + U            Delete till start of line (insert mode)
CTRL + W            Delete previous word (insert mode)

docs.title: Indent
docs.text:
CTRL + T            Indent (insert mode)
CTRL + D            Unindent (insert mode)

<<                  Indent line backward
>>                  Indent line forward
5>>                 Indent 5 lines forward
:>>>                Indent line forward 3 times

<[motion]           Indent backward
>[motion]           Indent forward
>}                  Indent Paragraph
[visual]5>          Indent the visual block 5 times

docs.title: Visual Mode
docs.text:
v                   Select from the cursor
V                   Select the line
CTRL + V            Select the block
gv                  Reselect the previous selection

docs.title: Surround
docs.text:
• Works with the vim-surround plugin (pre-installed in vscode)
  • To add space, use opening bracket: ysiw( will add ( hello )
  • To ignore space, use closing bracket: ysiw) will add (hello)
ysiw'               Surround the word with by ''
yss'                Surround the line with by ''

cs'"                Change the surround from '' to ""
cst<p>              Change the surround from current tag to <p>
ds'                 Drop the surround ''

vi'                 Select content inside ''
va'                 Select content around ''
yi"                 Yank content inside ""
ca)                 Change content around ()
di)                 Delete content inside ()

docs.title: Search
docs.text:
fx                  Search character x forward within the line
Fx                  Search character x backward within the line
;                   Repeat last search forward within the line
,                   Repeat last search backward within the line

*                   Search next match for the word under cursor
#                   Search previous match for the word under cursor

/pattern            Search forward
?pattern            Search backward
n                   Next match
N                   Previous match
:noh                Remove highlights

docs.title: Substitute
docs.text:
:s/old/new/g        Substitute within the line
:%s/old/new/g       Substitute within the file
&                   Repeat the last substitution

docs.title: Case
docs.text:
~                   Toggle case of character
g~[motion]          Toggle case

gu[motion]          Lowercase
gU[motion]          Uppercase

guu                 Lowercase line
gUU                 Uppercase line

docs.title: Marking
docs.text:
mx                  Mark current position as x
mX                  Global mark with file and location

`x                  Jump to x
'x                  Jump to x (at the start of the line)
``                  Jump to previous location
''                  Jump to previous location (at the start of the line)

`.                  Jump to last edit
`[                  Jump to last edit (at the start of the line)
`]                  Jump to last edit (at the end of the line)
gi                  Jump to last edit with insert

CTRL + O            Backward in jumplist
CTRL + I            Forward in jumplist
g;                  Backward in changelist
g,                  Forward in changelist
:marks              List marks

docs.title: Formatting
docs.text:
==                  Fix line indent
=G                  Indent till last line

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
ZZ, :x, :wq         Write and quit file
:w !sudo tee %      Write using sudo
%                   Current filename

:!cmd               Run command
:r !cmd             Read from command out
:n,m!cmd            Send lines n-m to command
:!!                 Repeat last command

:sh                 Start external shell
:term               Start internal terminal

docs.title: Basics
docs.text: Ctrl + P + P                Recent Files

docs.title: Basic Editing
docs.text:
Ctrl + X                    Cut line (empty selection)
Ctrl + C                    Copy line (empty selection)
Ctrl + +                    Move line down
Ctrl + -                    Move line up
Ctrl + Enter                Insert line below
Ctrl + Shift + Enter        Insert line above
Ctrl + Shift + \            Jump to matching bracket
Alt + ]                     Indent line
Ctrl + Down / Up            Scroll line down/up
Ctrl + Shift + [            Toggle Fold
Ctrl + Shift + [            Fold region
Ctrl + K + [                Fold all subregions
Ctrl + K + 0                Fold all regions
Ctrl + K J                  UnFold all regions

docs.title: Rich Language Editing
docs.text:
Ctrl + Shift + I            Format document
Ctrl + K + F                Format selection
F12                         Go to Definition
Ctrl + Shift + F10          Peek Definition
Ctrl + K F12                Open Definition to the side
Ctrl + .                    Quick Fix
Shift + F12                 Show References
F2                          Rename Symbol
Ctrl + Backspace            Delete Previous Word
Ctrl + Space + I            Trigger suggestion
Ctrl + Shift + Space        Trigger parameter hints

docs.title: Multi-cursor and Selection
docs.text:
Alt + Click                 Insert cursor
Shift + Alt + Up / Down     Insert cursor above/below
Ctrl + L                    Select current word
Ctrl + Shift + L            Select all occurrences of current selection
Ctrl + F2                   Select all occurrences of current word
Shift + Alt + Right         Expand selection
Shift + Alt + Left          Shrink selection
Shift + Alt + Drag mouse    Column (box) selection

docs.title: Search and Replace
docs.text:
Alt + Enter                 Select all occurrences of Find match
F3                          Find Next
Shift + F3                  Find Prev
Ctrl + F3                   Find Selection Next
Ctrl + Shift + F3           Find Selection Prev

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text:
Ctrl + Shift + >            Show Symbol List
Ctrl + Alt + O              Go to Symbol Global
Ctrl + Shift + O            Go to Symbol
Ctrl + Shift + 9            Go back
Ctrl + Shift + 0            Go forward
Ctrl + M                    Moves focus

docs.title: Git
docs.text:
Ctrl + Left                 Go to next change
Ctrl + Right                Go to previous change
Ctrl + Shift + 3            Show next change
Ctrl + Shift + 4            Show previous change

docs.title: Editor Management
docs.text:
Ctrl + \                    Split editor
Ctrl + 1 / 2                Focus into 1st, 2nd editor group

docs.title: File Management
docs.text:
Ctrl + K P                  Copy path of active file
Ctrl + K R                  Reveal active file in File Explorer
Ctrl + K + R                Reveal active file in Explorer

docs.title: Debug
docs.text:
F9                          Toggle breakpoint
F5                          Start / Continue
F11 / Shift + F11           Step into/out
F10                         Step over
Shift + F5                  Stop
Ctrl + K Ctrl + I           Show hover

docs.title: Integrated Terminal
docs.text:
Ctrl + `                    Show integrated terminal
Ctrl + Shift + `            Create new terminal
